snippet: A federal judge is not backing off her order to an Alabama probate judge that he must issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Callie V S Granade refuses to stay her order to Alabama probate Judge Don Davis that he must issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge is not backing off her order to an Alabama probate judge that he must issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.

headline.main: Alabama: Judge Won’t Stay Order on Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Judge Won’t Stay Order on Gay Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
